text: Michael Fassbender (born 2 April 1977) is a German and Irish actor. He is best known for appearing in the movies Inglourious Basterds (2009), X-Men: First Class (2011), Prometheus (2012), 12 Years a Slave (2013), and X-Men: Days of Future Past (2014). Fassbender was born in Heidelberg, Baden-Württemberg, West Germany (now Germany). His mother, Adele, is Irish and his father, Josef, is German. When he was two years old, his parents moved to Killarney, County Kerry, in the Republic of Ireland. He lives in London, England. He is fluent in both English and German. ==References== ==Filmography== Films 300 (2007) Solid Of Gold (2007) Legends of Destruction (2008) God Of War Part I (2009) Rise and Fall (2010) Birds (2010) God Of War Part II (2010) Demolished (2010) Godzilla (2011) X-Men First Class (2011) Legacy (2012) God Of War II - Killer Of The Thieves (2012) The Lion Battle (2013) Deathshot (2014) The Last Airbender II (2014) God Of War III - God Of The Seas (2014) Macbeth (2015) ==Other websites== * Category:1977 births Category:German movie actors Category:German stage actors Category:German television actors Category:German voice actors Category:Irish movie actors Category:Irish stage actors Category:Irish voice actors Category:Irish television actors Category:Living people Category:People from Baden-Württemberg
title: Michael Fassbender
